tool_description: An API showing all the football news around the world.
title: Football News

api_list.name: Get all football news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back news about football.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-news3.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-news3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get specific site football news
api_list.description: This endpoint gets football news from specific websites.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-news3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-news3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
